thread.title: Colin
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Colin

author: Colin
title: Colin
text: Country Attire was the only store stocking the item and size that I wanted. Although I ordered what I thought to be my size the store was quick to arrange a parcel collection and send out the next size smaller for me. Very happy customer.
